locations: New York City, New York, USA::(Fashion Week)
imdb.plot outline: Celebrities, designers, and fashion icons talk trends in this groundbreaking original fashion series. "The Trend" on Zappos Couture host Victoria Recaño has the insider's guide to the best trends at your fingertips. Captivating audiences on both the big and small screen, the Emmy award winning television personality brings you the latest looks that will put your best foot forward everyday of the week.
imdb.title: The Trend on Zappos Couture
akas: The Trend on Zappos Couture (United States)
